nodes.text: Cyricept was a corporation that operated during the time of the New Sith Wars, producing stealth suits, such as the Cyricept Personal Concealment System, Mark VI. The corporation was based in regions controlled by the Galactic Republic and as the Sith, the enemies of the Republic, expanded their holdings into Republic space, Cyricept repeatedly pulled back their operations from frontier regions, without having to be requested to do so by the Republic.
